group_1.narration: Tomorrow is finally gonna be Christmas Eve!
I got all my gifts ready to exchange with Ren tomorrow @and with everyone else at the party on Christmas. @All I have to do now is wait for the big day!
So for today, on Christmas Eve Eve, @I've been hanging out at a mixer @with some friends.
Since I'm busy Christmas Eve and Day, @I'm just here to help @the other girls because they’re like, @"I wanna have a boyfriend in time for Christmas!"
Although they just wanted me for even numbers, @I wanted to liven up the party, @so I tried my best to engage everyone in the fun...

group_1.textCenter: All right, so where's everyone planning to go for Christmas?

group_1.textRight: Uh, I guess I’ll head to the amusement park!

group_1.textLeft: I’d like to go see the Christmas light shows.

group_1.textRight: I'd... like to hang out with you guys wherever you @end up going.

group_1.textLeft: Aww, you’re so sweet!
Hm? Oh, I'm going to the aquarium!
My friend found out that there's a special @event going on right now.
This super cool thing called "Night at the @Aquarium"!

group_1.textRight: Why don’t we go there together for Christmas?

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, sorry, but no can do, mister.
*Giggle* Like I said, sorry!
But I promised my friend that we'd go together.
The offer was super thoughtful, though!
(Ren did all of that research for me...)
(I just know it'll be a totally awesome event!)
(Yeah, I can't wait for tomorrow...)

group_1.textRight: Well, I gotta use the restroom.

group_1.textLeft: I’ll be joining you guys...

group_1.textCenter: *Sigh* Those guys are all over you, aren't they?

group_1.textLeft: What's this all about?
If you wanna get their attention, you have to be @more appealing to them.

group_1.textCenter: That's easy for you to say.
Not all of us are charismatic like you, Rika.
I can't figure out how to say something that stands out...

group_1.textRight: I was such an idiot for thinking I could get a @boyfriend for Christmas...

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you kidding me?
You shouldn't want a boyfriend just because you @don’t wanna spend Christmas alone.
Isn't that being kind of rude?

group_1.textCenter: Hah? Then why did you even bother helping us?!

group_1.textLeft: That wasn't what I meant to help you with.
I thought you guys wanted to find someone you @liked...
Who you happend to spend Christmas with...
But if you're just trying to use someone for a day @or two so you won't feel lonely...
Isn't that like super insensitive to the person @you're dating?
Seriously, think about it.
If these guys only wanted you for the exact same reason...
Wouldn't you be upset that’s all they thought you @were good for?
You understand, right?
If all you're gonna do is get swept up in the people around you...
Then you're gonna lose sight of the things that @actually matter.

group_1.textCenter: I get what you're saying, Rika...

group_1.textLeft: Then there's no problem! I've got plenty @more to chat with you two about!
For starters, let's get to know each other better, @and try to find stuff we can all enjoy together!
